main event: A civilian witness reported seeing an object with a red light on the bottom, a detached green light on top, and a detached green light on the bottom with an intermittent flashing pattern over Fremont, California on August 29, 1961.
interesting points: The witness reported that there were 3 aircraft in the vicinity at the time, which may have been due to aircraft activity.
The object was described as being the size of a grapefruit, changing in color from pink to white to solid bronze.
The object had a round ball shape with a red light on top and a green light on the bottom, and the green light was detached.
The witness reported hearing a buzzing sound.
The object was observed for approximately 15 minutes, descending towards the south with a circular night turn.
sighted object: round ball-shaped object with red and green lights
